p: Qualitative and quantitative variables were compared between the two groups (2016â€“2017win and 2017sum) using the Chi-squared test and one-way analysis of variance (one-way ANOVA). No adjustment for multiple testing was performed. The levels of the replication and polymerase activity were statistically analyzed by a paired t test. Statistical analysis was performed using SPSS 18.0 (SPSS, Inc., Chicago, USA).
